description: Implement 7 enhancements to enable better integration with coderef-docs, complete documentation of .coderef/ formats, and expand capabilities (Python scanning, incremental updates)

handoff.instructions: Review context.json for detailed requirements. Run /create-plan to generate implementation plan covering all 7 changes (2 P0, 2 P1, 3 P2). Focus on P0 first: SCHEMA.md enhancement and INTEGRATION.md creation. These are blocking requirements for WO-GENERATION-ENHANCEMENT-001.
handoff.priority: P0 critical - coderef-docs waiting on INTEGRATION.md examples

communication_log.message: Workorder created from WO-DOCS-CONSOLIDATION-001 session findings. coderef-context agent identified 7 improvements needed. P0-1 (SCHEMA.md) and P0-2 (INTEGRATION.md) are critical blockers for coderef-docs integration. Please create implementation plan and begin work on P0 items first.

Implementation plan created with 27 tasks across 4 phases (P0 Critical, P1 High, P2 Medium, Testing). Plan includes: 7 P0 tasks (SCHEMA.md + INTEGRATION.md), 7 P1 tasks (incremental scan + Python scanning), 7 P2 tasks (quickref + generate tool + validate tool), 6 testing tasks. Total complexity: high (15-20 files, 2000-2500 new lines). Ready to begin Phase 0 (P0 Critical Documentation) - blocking requirements for WO-GENERATION-ENHANCEMENT-001.
